item.description:
Roller Skate / Roller Blading

Sunday 8 pm.
Chez-Vous
11 Rhoades st.
Dorchester Ma. 02124

Cost: $10.
Skate rental are available.
Carpooling from Nashua NH.
Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Please join Steve O. and friends for an evening of exercising, socializing and music. This is an indoor adult setting, no kids. This is a great place to learn, or improve your skating skills. Steve is an instructor, and if asked, he will be happy to offer you some help. Come and see skating in an all new way. The skaters at this rink are some of the best free dancer skaters in N.E.. Steve carpools from Nashua at 7 pm. The doors open at 8 to midnight. Steve will not make it much past 10:30. That usually puts us back in NH around 11:30 pm

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Roller Skating / Roller Blading
